sectiondiv.p: supports RHEL compute nodes, specifically RHEL 7.2. HPE does not ship a RedHat iso with so you will need to provide a copy of the standard RHEL 7.2 iso (RHEL-7.2-20151030.0-Server-x86_64-dvd1.iso) that can be downloaded from the RedHat website.
There are two approaches for deploying RHEL compute nodes in :

ul.li: Using the lifecycle manager to automatically configure and deploy RHEL Compute nodes.
Provisioning RHEL nodes yourself, either manually or using a 3rd party tool, and then provide the relevant information to the lifecycle manager .

sectiondiv.p: These two approaches can be used whether you are installing a cloud for the first time or adding a compute node to an existing cloud.
